title: Crypto Chaos: Dissecting Bitcoin’s Steepest Drop Since FTX’s Downfall
description: Bitcoin (BTC) has experienced a significant drop in its value, marking its most severe weekly decrease since the FTX crash in November 2022. The flagship cryptocurrency’s price went under the $26,000 mark, following a tumultuous period in the crypto market. At its lowest, Bitcoin’s value dropped to $25,392, a price not seen since mid-June. This […]

title: UK Regulator: Crypto Asset Businesses Expected to Comply with the Travel Rule Starting in September
description: According to the United Kingdom’s Financial Conduct Authority, crypto asset firms operating in the country will be required to comply with the Financial Action Task Force’s travel rule starting on Sept. 1, 2023. Crypto asset businesses will be required to take “all reasonable steps” to ensure compliance with the travel rule. When the rule becomes […]

title: LiFi Introduces Multi-Bridge Governance Solution Amidst Uniswap Controversy
description: In the ever-evolving world of decentralized finance (DeFi), the recent announcement by LiFi, a multichain bridging protocol, has garnered significant attention. On August 17, Arjun Chand, the research lead at LiFi, unveiled a new multi-message aggregator tailored for decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) governance. title: AMP Price Prediction 2023-2032: Is AMP a Good Investment?

title: SEC Seeks Expedited Appeal in Ripple’s XRP Case
description: The US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has taken a significant step in the ongoing legal battle with Ripple Labs over the classification of its XRP token. title: Solana-Powered Helium (HNT) Introduces Game-Changing Mobile Phone Plan: Disrupting Telecom with Blockchain
description: Helium Mobile, which operates on the Helium Network, is offering unlimited text, talk, and data without a contract for $5 a month. Helium Mobile operates using a hybrid coverage model, which allows users to seamlessly roam onto the T-Mobile network when its signal is weak or unavailable. title: Analyst Shares Why It Is Important For BNB To Stay Above $212
description:
The price of Binance Coin (BNB) has maintained a level above $212 due to specific factors influencing the market, according to a Twitter post shared by a cryptocurrency analyst yesterday. One of these factors is the existence of a BNB collateralized loans offered by Binance, which has a liquidation threshold at $212. This threshold was […]
